options.title: -p
options.description: print existing completion specifications in a reusable format

options.title: -r
options.description: remove a completion specification for each NAME, or, if no NAMEs are supplied, all completion specifications

options.title: -D
options.description: apply the completions and actions as the default for commands without any specific completion defined

options.title: -E
options.description: apply the completions and actions to "empty" commands -- completion attempted on a blank line

options.title: -I
options.description: apply the completions and actions to the initial (usually the command) word
